Class Country

  • java.lang.Object
    • Country

  • public class Country
extends java.lang.Object
    Country serves as the primary representation of data for this application. This class implements several attributes found in real world countries.
    Since:
    2017-01-31
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Olivier Perrault (250890527)
